fever.description: Elevated body temperature above 100.4°F (38°C), indicating the body is fighting an infection or illness

severity_indicators.severe: Temperature above 103°F, lasting more than 3 days, or accompanied by confusion

emergency_signs: Fever with severe headache and stiff neck

headache.description: Pain or discomfort in the head, scalp, or neck region

severity_indicators.mild: Dull ache, doesn't interfere with daily activities
severity_indicators.severe: Intense pain, unable to perform normal activities, may include nausea

emergency_signs: Sudden severe headache (worst of your life)
Headache with fever and stiff neck
Headache with vision changes or difficulty speaking

cough.description: Sudden expulsion of air from the lungs to clear airways of irritants, mucus, or foreign particles

severity_indicators.mild: Occasional dry cough, no other symptoms
severity_indicators.moderate: Persistent cough with mucus, interferes with sleep
severity_indicators.severe: Coughing up blood, severe chest pain, difficulty breathing

emergency_signs: Cough with chest pain and rapid heartbeat

chest_pain.description: Discomfort or pain felt anywhere in the chest area, from neck to upper abdomen

severity_indicators.mild: Brief discomfort, related to movement or breathing
severity_indicators.severe: Crushing pain, radiating to arm/jaw, with sweating and shortness of breath

emergency_signs: Crushing chest pain lasting more than 5 minutes
Pain radiating to arm, jaw, or back
Chest pain with shortness of breath
Chest pain with sweating and nausea
Sudden sharp chest pain with difficulty breathing

shortness_of_breath.description: Difficulty breathing or feeling unable to get enough air

severity_indicators.severe: Breathlessness at rest, unable to speak full sentences

emergency_signs: Inability to speak due to breathlessness

nausea.description: Feeling of sickness with an urge to vomit

severity_indicators.mild: Occasional queasiness, able to eat small amounts
severity_indicators.severe: Constant nausea with vomiting, unable to keep fluids down

emergency_signs: Severe headache with nausea and stiff neck

fatigue.description: Persistent tiredness or exhaustion that doesn't improve with rest

severity_indicators.mild: Feeling tired but able to complete daily tasks
severity_indicators.moderate: Significant tiredness affecting work or activities
severity_indicators.severe: Extreme exhaustion, unable to perform basic activities

emergency_signs: Sudden extreme fatigue with chest pain
Fatigue with confusion or difficulty breathing
Fatigue with severe weakness or numbness
Unexplained fatigue with significant weight loss

abdominal_pain.description: Pain or discomfort in the stomach or belly area

severity_indicators.severe: Intense pain, rigid abdomen, unable to move comfortably

emergency_signs: Severe pain in lower right abdomen
Pain with fever and inability to pass stool
Abdominal pain with fainting or shock

dizziness.description: Feeling lightheaded, unsteady, or experiencing a spinning sensation

severity_indicators.severe: Severe spinning sensation, unable to stand, with vomiting

emergency_signs: Dizziness with difficulty speaking or weakness
Dizziness with rapid or irregular heartbeat

sore_throat.description: Pain, scratchiness, or irritation of the throat

severity_indicators.severe: Extreme pain, difficulty swallowing, drooling, breathing difficulty

emergency_signs: Drooling or inability to swallow saliva
Severe throat pain with high fever
Muffled voice or difficulty opening mouth
